quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that counts. It's the years in your life
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: My only regret, Anna - but is it only one? - is to not have finished anything. I left all as a draft, shattered words here and there.
quotes.author: Alexandre in Bruno Ganz: Alexandros

quotes.quote: You either die a hero or live long enough to see yourself become the villain
quotes.author: Batman

quotes.quote: The truth is everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The pain I feel now is the happiness I had before. That's the deal
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: To love at all is to be vulnerable. Love anything, and your heart will be wrung and possibly broken. If you want to make sure of keeping it intact, you must give your heart to no one, not even to an animal. Wrap it carefully round with hobbies and little luxuries; avoid all entanglements; lock it up safe in the casket or coffin of your selfishness. But in that casket—safe, dark, motionless, airless—it will change. It will not be broken; it will become unbreakable, impenetrable, irredeemable. The alternative to tragedy, or at least to the risk of tragedy, is damnation. The only place outside Heaven where you can be perfectly safe from all the dangers and perturbations of love is Hell.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: If you're going to try, go all the way. Otherwise, don't even start. This could mean losing girlfriends, wives, relatives and maybe even your mind. It could mean not eating for three or four days. It could mean freezing on a park bench. It could mean jail. It could mean derision. It could mean mockery--isolation. Isolation is the gift. All the others are a test of your endurance, of how much you really want to do it. And, you'll do it, despite rejection and the worst odds. And it will be better than anything else you can imagine. If you're going to try, go all the way. There is no other feeling like that. You will be alone with the gods, and the nights will flame with fire. You will ride life straight to perfect laughter. It's the only good fight there is
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Difficulties mastered are opportunities won
quotes.author: Churchill

quotes.quote: We can't change the direction of the wind, but we can adjust the sails
quotes.author: Cora L.V. Hatch

quotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment until it becomes a memory
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once
quotes.author: Einstein

quotes.quote: We feel free when we escape, even if it be but from the frying pan and into the fire
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Cowards never start, the weak never finish
quotes.author: Father Fehily

quotes.quote: Wise too late, old too soon
quotes.author: Father Fehily

quotes.quote: Life moves pretty fast, if you don't stop and stare for a while, it might pass you by
quotes.author: Ferris Bueller

quotes.quote: Without leaps of imagination, you lose the excitement of possibility.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Everyone, deep in their hearts, is waiting for the end of the world to come
quotes.author: Haruki Marakami

quotes.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: There's nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man. True nobility is being superior to your former self
quotes.author: Hemmingway

quotes.quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Artists without an air of loneliness are boring
quotes.author: Hidemi Kon

quotes.quote: If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: One day I will find the right words, and they will be simple
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Life is more manageable when thought of as a scavenger hunt as opposed to a surprise party
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: All happy families are alike, but every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: "Oh, you can't help that", said the cat. "We're all mad here"
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Often to understand, we have to look into emptiness
quotes.author: Michelangelo Antonioni

quotes.quote: Death is nothing, but to live defeated and inglorious is to die daily
quotes.author: Napoleon

quotes.quote: I know no better purpose for life than to die in service of the great and the impossible
quotes.author: Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Pretend to be completely in control, and people will assume you are
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell to Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If you want a happy ending, it depends on where you stop the story
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: To cure the soul by means of the senses, and senses by means of the soul
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Every portrait that is painted with feeling is a portrait of the artist, not of the sitter. The sitter is merely the accident, the occasion. It is not he who is revealed by the painter; it is rather the painter who, on the coloured canvas, reveals himself
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Conscience and cowardice are really the same things, Basil. Conscience is the trade-name of the firm. That is all
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Good artists copy, great artists steal
quotes.author: Picasso

quotes.quote: There are many things of which a wise man may wish to be ignorant
quotes.author: Ralph Emerson

quotes.quote: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past
quotes.author: Scott F. Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: His sturdy egoism could no longer sustain his peremptory heart
quotes.author: Scott F. Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: A rose by any other name would smell as sweet
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: One that has loved not wisely, but too well
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Parting is such sweet sorrow
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Better to be a pirate than join the navy
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The end is where we start from
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: We beat well worn paths
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You should be aware of the system but lose yourself in it
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I find my truest self in solitude
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: People are who they are
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: In the end, it's all about old friends
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: We're not all one thing
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: We all wear masks, and the time comes when we cannot remove them without removing some of our own skin
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Never make decisions when you're reeling from a loss
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best things in life lie on the other side of sacrifice
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I know of no better life purpose than to perish in attempting the great and impossible. The fact that something seems impossible shouldn't be a reason to not pursue it. That's exactly what makes it worth pursuing, where would the courage and greatness be if success was certain and there was no risk. The only true failure is shrinking away from life's challenges.
quotes.author: Unknown
